title: Where did my money go riot?
body:
I bought the $20 Riot point bundle things but it did not work. it took the money from my account, but it is not showing up. PLZ HELP. I know it is not a permanent issue because when I tried the $5 it worked and added it and removed $5 from my account but earlier when I tried $20 it just ate my money. What I am trying to say is that with the $20 it took money but did not give RP but with the $5 it took money and gave RP. Where the RP at?
                                                                                  ~ThePhysiscyst

replies.body:
Since this is a billing issue and will require some investigation, I recommend [submitting a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Our billing specialists will be able to further dive into this and work with you on a solution there.

Let me know if you have any questions.
How long does it usually take for them to respond to my support ticket?
I have submitted a report and will let you know what happens
